• If this doesn’t speed up 
labour, you may be given a 
drip containing a hormone, 
which is fed into a vein into 
your arm to encourage 
contractions. You may want 
some pain relief before the 
drip is started.
• After the drip is attached, 
your contractions and your 
baby’s heartbeat will be 
continuously monitored.
The second stage of labour 
– the baby’s birth
